Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
controller.ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing BTO projects, officer registrations, and applications within the HDB Management System. It includes methods to create, edit, delete, and toggle visibility for projects, as well as approve/reject officer registrations and applications.

  • Method Details

    • canCreateNewProject

      public boolean canCreateNewProject(HDBManager manager, Project newProject)
      Checks if a HDB Manager can create a new project.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDBManager instance requesting to create the project
      newProject - the new project to be created
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the new project can be created

    • getManagedProjects

      public List<Project> getManagedProjects(HDBManager manager)
      Returns the list of projects managed by the specified HDB Manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDBManager instance whose projects are to be fetched
      Returns:
      List of projects managed by the specified manager

    • createProject

      public void createProject(HDBManager manager, Project project)
      Creates a new project and adds it to the manager's list of managed projects.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDBManager instance creating the project
      project - the project to be created

    • editProject

      public void editProject(Project project, String newName, String newNeighbourhood, int new2Room, int new3Room, double new2RoomPrice, double new3RoomPrice, LocalDate newOpen, LocalDate newClose, int newmaxOfficer, Boolean newVisible)
      Edits the details of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to be edited
      newName - the new name for the project
      newNeighbourhood - the new neighbourhood for the project
      new2Room - the updated number of 2-room flats
      new3Room - the updated number of 3-room flats
      new2RoomPrice - the updated price for 2-room flats
      new3RoomPrice - the updated price for 3-room flats
      newOpen - the new application start date
      newClose - the new application end date
      newmaxOfficer - the updated maximum number of officers for the project
      newVisible - the updated visibility status of the project

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(HDBManager manager, Project project)
      Deletes a project from the manager's list and the project service.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDBManager instance deleting the project
      project - the project to be deleted

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(Project project, boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility status of a project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project whose visibility is being toggled
      visible - the new visibility status

    • viewOfficerRegistrations

      public void viewOfficerRegistrations(List<Project> managerProjects, List<HDBOfficer> allOfficers)
      Displays the officer registrations for the specified manager's projects.
      Parameters:
      managerProjects - the list of projects managed by the manager
      allOfficers - the list of all officers to check for registrations

    • approveOfficer

      public void approveOfficer(Project project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Approves an officer's registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project for which the officer is being approved
      officer - the officer to approve for the project

    • rejectOfficer

      public void rejectOfficer(Project project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Rejects an officer's registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project for which the officer is being rejected
      officer - the officer to reject for the project

    • getApplicationsForManagedProjects

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForManagedProjects(HDBManager manager)
      Retrieves the list of applications for all projects managed by the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDBManager instance whose applications are to be fetched
      Returns:
      List of applications for the manager's managed projects

      public void approveApplication(Application app)

      Parameters:
      app - the application to be approved

    • rejectApplication

      Rejects an application and updates its status accordingly.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to be rejected

      public void rejectWithdrawal(Application app)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      app - the application whose withdrawal request is to be rejected

    • getAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries(List<Project> projects)
      Retrieves all enquiries related to the specified projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - the list of projects whose enquiries are to be fetched
      Returns:
      List of all enquiries for the specified projects

    • generateApplicantReport

      public List<Application> generateApplicantReport(HDBManager manager, String filterCategory, String filterType)
      Generates a report of applications based on the specified filters.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDBManager instance generating the report
      filterCategory - the category to filter the applications (e.g., marital status, flat type)
      filterType - the type of filter value to apply
      Returns:
      List of applications filtered based on the specified criteria

    • getPendingOfficers

      public List<HDBOfficer> getPendingOfficers(List<HDBOfficer> allOfficers, Project selectedProject)
      Retrieves the list of officers who have pending registrations for a specified project.
      Parameters:
      allOfficers - the list of all officers to check for pending registrations
      selectedProject - the project for which pending officer registrations are to be fetched
      Returns:
      List of HDBOfficers with pending registrations for the project

    • findProjectByName

      public Project findProjectByName(String projectName, HDBManager manager)
      Finds a project by its name within the list of projects managed by the manager.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to search for
      manager - the HDBManager instance whose projects are to be searched
      Returns:
      the project with the specified name, or null if not found
